asset.name: EDG-15400
asset.modality: Small molecule (oral, novel cardiac sarcomere modulator)
asset.one_liner: EDG-15400 is a novel cardiac sarcomere modulator in Phase 1 for heart failure with preserved ejection fraction (HFpEF), with Phase 1 data expected H1 2026 and Phase 2 initiation and results in H1 2027.

biology.simple_explanation: EDG-15400 modulates the cardiac sarcomere to improve heart function in patients with heart failure where the heart muscle is stiff and cannot relax properly (HFpEF).

mechanism.differentiation: Differentiated from EDG-7500; targeting heart failure rather than HCM

lead.name: Heart Failure with Preserved Ejection Fraction (HFpEF)

trials.name: Phase 1 SAD/MAD
trials.design: Randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, single and multiple ascending dose in healthy adults

market_opportunity.unmet_need: HFpEF has limited treatment options and represents a large patient population

catalysts.event: Phase 1 SAD/MAD data in healthy adults
catalysts.bull_scenario: Clean safety enables rapid Phase 2 entry
Validates cardiac sarcomere modulation in heart failure â€” very large market

recommended_supplementary_sources: Edgewise R&D presentations for mechanism details
